name: Super MOBA(Alpha)
description:
This is a multiplayer 2d shooter game and it aims to please casual players.

It is shooter game which is divided into 2 Team Red Team and Green Team

The goal is to kill other team players but shoot carefully as it will hurt your Team player also.

Note - This is just a alpha release of the game and the graphics will soon be updated

Future update

Caracter customization

New weapons

Money system

Main Menu

Updated graphics

Remember - it is in early stage of development I will keep updating it but for that please support it by your precious donation.

press W to jump

press A and D to run around

press shift to show chat

Left Mouse click to shoot

Press F1 while in game to open description and see its new update features
